name: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality in the American South.
A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about totalitarianism.

name: Pride and Prejudice
description: A romantic novel that charts the emotional development of the protagonist Elizabeth Bennet.

name: The Great Gatsby
description: A novel about the American dream and the roaring twenties.

name: Moby-Dick
description: The narrative of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to kill the white whale.

name: War and Peace
description: A historical novel that chronicles the French invasion of Russia.

name: The Catcher in the Rye
description: A story about teenage alienation and loss of innocence.

name: The Hobbit
description: A fantasy novel about the quest of home-loving Bilbo Baggins.

name: Fahrenheit 451
description: A dystopian novel about a future society where books are banned.

name: Jane Eyre
description: A novel about the experiences of the eponymous heroine.

name: Crime and Punishment
description: A psychological novel about crime, guilt, and redemption.

name: The Odyssey
description: An epic poem about Odysseus’ long journey home after the Trojan War.

name: Brave New World
description: A dystopian novel that anticipates developments in reproductive technology.

name: The Lord of the Rings
description: An epic fantasy novel about the quest to destroy the One Ring.

name: Animal Farm
description: An allegorical novella reflecting events leading up to the Russian Revolution.

name: Wuthering Heights
description: A novel about passion and revenge on the Yorkshire moors.

name: The Picture of Dorian Gray
description: A philosophical novel about vanity and moral corruption.

name: Dracula
description: A gothic horror novel introducing Count Dracula.

name: Frankenstein
description: A novel about a scientist who creates a sentient creature.

name: The Grapes of Wrath
description: A story about the hardships of a poor family during the Great Depression.

name: The Alchemist
description: A novel about a shepherd's journey to fulfill his personal legend.

name: Les Misérables
description: An epic novel about social injustice in 19th century France.

name: The Count of Monte Cristo
description: A story of an innocent man’s betrayal and revenge.

name: Great Expectations
description: A coming-of-age novel featuring the orphan Pip.
